actions.title: PDF/UA Validation VeraPDF
actions.name: validation_report_arlington
actions.desc: An action that validates PDFs using veraPDF, the industry-supported open-source PDF/UA validator, and saves results as HTML, XML, or JSON reports.

configurations.title: HTML Validation Report
configurations.name: html_validation_report_flavour
configurations.desc: Generate a PDF validation report in HTML format
configurations.program: docker run --platform linux/amd64 -v "${working_directory}:/data" --rm pdfix/arlington-pdf-model:latest validate --flavour "${flavour}" --format html --input "${input_pdf}" --output "${output_html}"

args.name: max_failures
args.desc: Limit of checked fails. If fails reached limit, validation stops.

args.name: max_failures_displayed
args.desc: Maximum fails to displayed. If -1, displayed all.

args.name: input_pdf
args.desc: Path to PDF document you want to proccess
